mapper.select: SELECT LS_ID AS lsId, LS_PRICE AS lsPrice, LS_NAME AS lsName, LS_ADDRESS AS lsAddress, LS_POLL_DIV AS lsPollDiv, LS_UPDATE_DATE AS lsUpdateDate, LS_SIDOCD AS lsSidoCd FROM LOWEST_STATION a WHERE (LS_PRICE, LS_SIDOCD) IN ( SELECT MIN(LS_PRICE) AS MIN_PRICE, LS_SIDOCD FROM LOWEST_STATION GROUP BY LS_SIDOCD )
